work.company: Associated Students of the University of California Santa Barbara
highlights: Utilized PyTorch, Trio3, and other modern software to develop a pipeline harnessing Unet, TeethSeg, and other medial machine learning networks.
Organized and participated with cross-departmental teams to design and implement novel AI architecture in the clinical setting.
Authored and co-authored a research paper detailing findings and results for publication in peer-reviewed journals and academic conferences.
Conducted extensive literature reviews and synthesized research findings to develop novel deep learning approaches to medical image analysis.
Contributed to a 40% increase in lab funding by driving key research advancements during tenure.
Constructed a personable chatbot for commonly asked questions using decision trees, reducing human intervention and casework load by 19%.
Upgraded scheduling software using logistic regression to auto-reschedule tenants in between open slots, improving casework efficiency by 40%.
Trained algorithms on classifying property management providers on ratemyivrental.com using sentimental analysis.
Organized Agile development team to improve feature development times by 30% through ad hoc committees.
Conformed the organization's website to WCAG 2 standards for better content delivery to student tenants and website visitors.
Led a web development team to monitor and refactor the company's website while allowing for backward compatibility with existing APIs.
Calibrated website to satisfy university and WCAG 2 requirements.
Implemented Redis caching and CDNs to improve load times by 23%.
Formalized new member orientation to the codebase and simplified introduction period by 1 week.
Maintained the internal WordPress plugin, ensuring bug fixes and a 99.999% uptime.

education.area: Computer Science (B.S.) | Psychology & Brain Science (B.S.) | Statistical Science Minor
